content:
I think there might be some confusion! The Hilton Hotel in downtown Chicago doesn't have a private beach and multiple pools. Chicago is a landlocked city, so there aren't any beaches nearby. The hotel might have an indoor pool or a fitness center, but not a private beach.

However, I'm glad you're taking care of yourself and wanting to make healthy choices! Enjoy your lunch at The Gage, and don't worry too much about indulging – it's all about balance, right?
